blogPost.excerpt: Halbestunde introduces a new way of learning the piano. The AI app is a co-trainer, ready to give you customized feedback at any time. Therefore, we use a specifically developed algorithm that allows the app to recognize and play every piece of music you want.
blogPost.body: Halbestunde introduces a new way of learning the piano. The AI app is a co-trainer, ready to give you customized feedback at any time. Therefore, we use a specifically developed algorithm that allows the app to recognize and play every piece of music you want.
blogPost.title: Halbestunde - Scan your piece of music and start practicing right away
blogPost.author: Tiberius Treppner

localize.description: Halbestunde引入了一种新的学琴方式。这款人工智能应用是一个辅助教练，随时可以给你定制化的反馈。因此，我们使用了专门开发的算法，让应用能够识别并弹奏你想要的每一首音乐。
localize.tagline: 扫描您的音乐作品，并立即开始练习。

localize.description: Halbestunde引入了一種新的學琴方式。這款人工智能應用是一個輔助教練，隨時可以給你定製化的反饋。因此，我們使用了專門開發的算法，讓應用能夠識別並彈奏你想要的每一首音樂。
localize.tagline: 掃描您的音樂作品，並立即開始練習。

previous.excerpt: Spend less time worrying about QA, PR reviews and API pipelines with Inso, the Insomnia CLI that integrates directly with your CI/CD pipeline with ease.
previous.title: Insomnia CLI - Speed up API CI/CD pipeline development

localize.description: 使用Inso，Insomnia CLI可直接与您的CI/CD流水线轻松集成，减少对QA、PR审查和API流水线的担忧。
使用Inso，Insomnia CLI可直接與您的CI/CD流水線輕鬆集成，減少對QA、PR審查和API流水線的擔憂。

next.excerpt: A stupidly simple and private text tool that I made for personal use to help me think multidimensionally.
next.title: Four note boards - A simply stupid text tool to help think multidimensionally

localize.description: 我个人做的一个愚蠢简单的私密文字工具，帮助我进行多维度的思考。
localize.tagline: 一个简单笨拙的文字工具，帮助人们进行多维度的思考

localize.description: 我個人做的一個愚蠢簡單的私密文字工具，幫助我進行多維度的思考。
localize.tagline: 一個簡單笨拙的文字工具，幫助人們進行多維度的思考
